programme.title: Wildest Africa: Zambezi: Wild Water

programme.title: Wildest Indochina: Southwest China: China's Secret Garden
programme.desc: Tucked away in China's southwest corner is a hidden oasis unlike any other. Snow-capped mountains, temperate valleys and tropical jungles are home to a spectacular array of wildlife.

programme.title: Wildest Indochina: Thailand: The Wild Heart

programme.title: Wildest Islands: Zanzibar: Land of Giants

programme.title: Wildest Middle East: Egypt: Survivors in the Sands

programme.title: Bottle Shock

programme.title: The Last Legion

programme.title: Andromeda: A Symmetry of Imperfection
programme.desc: When Rommie becomes too emotional, the ship cuts her access in order to run diagnostics.

programme.title: Andromeda

programme.title: Sensing Murder: Little Boy Lost

programme.title: Sensing Murder: Lost for Words
programme.desc: Spirited teenager Jayne Furlong dreamed of becoming a child psychologist - instead, she ended up a prostitute. In 1993, 17 year old Jayne vanished from her patch on Auckland's Karangahape Road.

programme.title: Sensing Murder

programme.title: Sensing Murder: Psychics Revealed - Special

programme.title: Sensing Murder: The Lie of the Land

programme.title: Crime Investigation Australia: Contract to Kill / The Mornington Monster

programme.title: Crime Investigation Australia: The Killing Fields of Truro

programme.title: Crime Investigation Australia: Kid for Ransom / Tears for Daniel
programme.desc: We examine two notorious abduction cases. The first case is the Graeme Thorne ransom kidnapping at Bondi in 1960. Thorne, aged eight, was the son of winners of the Sydney Opera House Lottery.

programme.title: McLeod's Daughters: Wild Horses

programme.title: McLeod's Daughters: Suspicious Minds
programme.desc: When evidence mounts against Stevie, Kate starts to believe that she could be guilty of Harry Ryans murder. Riley reacts badly when a local trainer is revealed to be abusing his horses.

programme.title: McLeod's Daughters: Days Of Reckoning
programme.desc: Kate learns a valuable lesson about trusting her heart when she realises she was wrong to go to the police about Stevie.

programme.title: McLeod's Daughters: Scratch The Surface
programme.desc: When Leo returns to the district, Stevie loses control when trying to prove he murdered Harry Ryan. Alex discovers Fiona lied about the pregnancy.

programme.title: McLeod's Daughters: For Better or Worse
programme.desc: Moiras decision to take a shortcut leads to a dangerous petrol spill on Drovers Run. His marriage on shaky ground, Alexs world is turned upside down when he and Stevie nearly kiss.

programme.title: Undercover Boss USA
programme.desc: Rick Tigner, the president of Kendall-Jackson Wine Estates, the second largest family owned wine company in the world, goes undercover posing as a grocery store employee who is pursuing his dream job in the wine industry.

programme.title: Undercover Boss Canada
programme.desc: Brian Scudamore, 1-800-GOT-JUNK? founder and CEO, goes undercover as a driver and junk collector, hauling loads of unwanted clutter in the worlds largest junk removal franchise, and comes out collecting something much more valuable.

programme.title: Undercover Boss Canada
programme.desc: CEO Ellis Jacob goes undercover doling out snacks and tickets while assessing how to enhance the moviegoer experience within Canadas largest motion picture exhibitor across the board.

programme.title: Undercover Boss Canada
programme.desc: Tervita specializes in environmental clean-up for Western Canadas booming energy and mining industries. It doesnt take long for Fory Musser,

programme.title: Undercover Boss Canada
programme.desc: Purdys dominates the West Coast, but is struggling to make an impression elsewhere. To boost sales, the Chocolate Queen travels the country, working in disguise in her own stores and factory floors.

programme.title: Undercover Boss Canada

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Tears for Fears
programme.desc: Baby Lyssa wakes up in a jail cell, but ignores the ensuing media frenzy in order to befriend a woman waging a personal battle against drug addiction.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Picture This
programme.desc: A fugitive with a long criminal record has fled to Hawaii, and the bondsman on the mainland has asked Dog for help. Dog doesn't have much information to work with, but he can use the felon's desire to impress his friends to track him down.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Tag, You're It
programme.desc: To his traditional bounty hunting tools of confidential informants, canvassing, and silver-tongued subterfuge the world's greatest bounty hunter has added Facebook! A word to the wise for those on the run-post at your own peril, the Dog is watching!

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: A Family Affair
programme.desc: Dog likes to say, "The apple doesn't fall far from the tree," and this is a hunt where that is true. So will Dog be able to use one family member's troubled ways to catch another one in trouble with the law?

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Training Day
programme.desc: While the team tries to handle the bond that newcomer Alysin wrote incorrectly, sparks are flying between Beth and Duane Lee when he questions Beth's decision to go on the hunt without Dog leading the charge!

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Cutting the Apron Strings
programme.desc: Two different young men both have a bad habit of missing their court dates. Looking over their files Dog senses that they have another trait in common, both are a little too tied to their mothers.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Short Handed
programme.desc: Dog's target today has a history of violence, and apparently plans to re-locate without notifying the proper authorities. Unfortunately the team is missing a key player, Duane Lee is MIA today distracted by his new lady love.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Photo Op
programme.desc: Dog and Duane Lee can't agree about what role Duane Lee should have in the family business. But the family comes together as they set out to hunt a chronic violator with an open warrant and a wife who has an odd request for Dog.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: A House Divided
programme.desc: Dog has dropped Duane Lee from the team. When Leland confronts Dog and Beth about the decision tempers flare. But they have to come together to answer a cry for help from a mother who feels that the safest place for her daughter is jail.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Fishful Thinking
programme.desc: Jase's hopes to win the inaugural Duck Commander Fishing Tournament is buoyed when he is able to enlist the help of legendary angler Bill Dance. Meanwhile, Willie's vanity over his greying beard leads him to make a questionable decision.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: When Doves Fry
programme.desc: Jase and Jep make a deal with Mia and Merritt to get them to go dove hunting with them. Si tries to make some extra cash by starting a West Monroe tour.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Carpnado
programme.desc: Jumping Asian carp have invaded Monroe's waters so Jase and the guys set out to try to stop them from spreading further. Meanwhile, Willie and Si have to run Willie's Duck Diner for the day.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: The Campfire Diaries
programme.desc: The family spends a weekend at their childhood summer camp, reliving old memories and working to repair a tennis court Willie built twenty years ago. While at the camp, Jep tries to pass a lifeguard swimming test he failed as a teenager.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Rowdy's Big Day
programme.desc: Rowdy's adoption is finalized and he officially becomes a Robertson. Jase gets his first massage and enjoys it more than he expected.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Disappearing Acts
programme.desc: After Willie and Jase lose Si's tea cup, Si makes them go to great lengths to find it. When the entertainment for Gus's 1st birthday party falls through, Jep fills in as a magician.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Dance Dads
programme.desc: Willie, Korie, Jase and Missy take dance lessons from Sadie to prepare for Reed and Rebecca's upcoming weddings. Jase's plan to perform Reed's wedding ceremony may fall through when he waits until the last minute to renew his ordainment.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: End of an Era
programme.desc: When Si decides to retire to pursue a music career, the family organizes a party in his honor. Meanwhile, Willie, Phil, and Jase take a road trip to try to recreate an old duck call for Si's retirement gift.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Looking Back and Talking Quack
programme.desc: The Robertson family takes a look back at 130 episodes of Duck Dynasty.

programme.title: Timber Kings: German Efficiency
programme.desc: Beats schedule is thrown by German customs and theres only one way to catch up, Bryan Sr. takes Peter to the wilderness and they harvest 200-foot trees.

programme.title: Timber Kings: Arkansas Shuffle
programme.desc: Beat sets logs in the pouring Arkansas rain for a client who orders renovations on the fly, a Catholic priest convinces Bryan Sr. and Peter to build a wedding gazebo for free.

programme.title: Timber Kings: The Boss Can Build
programme.desc: Andr the GM and master salesman must go to Ontario and lead his first build in more than 10 years, Beat has to collaborate in carving a hairy friend.

programme.title: Timber Kings: Old Dog, New Tricks
programme.desc: Bryan Sr. resurrects an ancient crane dubbed Rust Bucket to complete a remote fishing cabin. Meanwhile, Beat struggles with two huge projects competing for time and square footage on the work yard.

programme.title: Timber Kings: Cold War
programme.desc: In Kansas, tensions run high when Andre muscles in on Sams big build. And back at the log yard, winter gales put a chill on Peters enormous project for a Russian client.

programme.title: Divorce Court: Like a Virgin
programme.desc: Emily is 29 and a virgin. The pressure from her boyfriend Romeo to have sex is overwhelming. Their 20 year age difference may be part of the problem because she chats it up more with strangers than him. Can Judge Toler help them find common ground?

programme.title: Divorce Court: Brexit
programme.desc: Over 17 years of marriage Leon has had countless affairs with other women and Siobhan has had it. She claims all he wants is for her to keep his house clean and pick up after him. Leon argues that the problems stem from Siobhans bad drinking habits.

programme.title: Divorce Court: Secret Lies
programme.desc: Billy wants Marylu to quit pole dancing and stripping, while she wants Billy to confess if hes straight or not. Billy has a fetish for wearing womens underwear and he needs to fess up if he likes women, men or both.

programme.title: Divorce Court: Can't Buy Love
programme.desc: Chimira gets lavish vacations, gifts and a designer wardrobe from Bennie, but suspects he is cheating on her. Bennie says she should be grateful for her good life. Can Bennie learn to give his time and support instead of luxuries and an empty home?

programme.title: Divorce Court: Not Man Enough
programme.desc: No matter how hard Demont tries, he's always looking up at the bar Reasha keeps raising. Demont got a promotion and relocated for work, which raised her suspicions of him cheating. Can this couple ignite the spark or is this relationship totaled?

programme.title: Divorce Court: Nana Bread
programme.desc: Markia says Herb's overactive sex drive is ruining their relationship because he wants it daily. When Herb doesn't get his way, he throws major tantrums. Can Herb learn to take breathers or has this 11 year relationship taking its toll?

programme.title: Divorce Court: Dead Weight
programme.desc: They say opposites attract, but Betty is starting to feel weighed down by David. David is lazy and disrespectful for how broke he is all the time. Betty no longer wants to be tied down by being with someone who is always unemployed and lies about it.

programme.title: Divorce Court: Out for Delivery
programme.desc: Jeanine says Marvin is cheating with co-workers and often meets up with his exes when they visit family in their hometown. He asserts shes the one who cheated, not him, and she is so insecure she wont stop bugging him about it.

programme.title: Divorce Court: Blame It on the Sun
programme.desc: When Milton came into Sonas life, all the stars were aligned but now their relationship has been out of orbit. Sona is a firm believer in astrology and zodiac signs, but this Leo can no longer tolerate the cheating ways of Milton who is an Aries.

programme.title: Divorce Court: My Money
programme.desc: Barbara says Alicia is a cheater and a thief. Barbara's seen Alicias text messages from men and asserts she is verbally abusive and financially irresponsible. Alicia says Barbara is controlling, a liar, selfish and never committed to their marriage.

programme.title: Divorce Court: Age Ain't Nothin but a Number
programme.desc: Kelley feels Keionte's childish behavior has her considering burning their marriage license. He claims that once they married, Mommie Dearest was born and no longer wants to be her business partner! Can they figure it out before it's too late?

programme.title: Divorce Court: Once a Cheater Always a Cheater
programme.desc: Alyssia says Devonte is a serial cheater, but wants to save their relationship. He says she's insecure and stalks his social media. They share a child, but Devonte doesn't want to commit if she won't change. Can Judge Toler help them?

programme.title: Run's House: Bonless Chicken Dinner
programme.desc: The episode begins with Rev Run on stage in what is his final performance of his tour with Kid Rock. Rev returns home and his hopes of getting his diet back on track are thwarted by Russy's new cooking hobby.

programme.title: Run's House: Pass The Frame
programme.desc: With the final mix of their debut album just around the corner, Team Blackout takes the next step in their pursuit of ultimate rap dominance: self-promotion.

programme.title: Run's House: Outside The Box
programme.desc: Making the Honor Roll has been something Rev and Justine have come to expect from Diggy and Russy over the years. So when their latest report cards show them not making it, Rev confronts the boys about it.

programme.title: Run's House: Mole Beauty, Mole Problems
programme.desc: A trip to the orthodontist for Diggy and Russy brings the family some surprising news: That Russy will be getting his braces off before Diggy, who will have to wait another two months.

programme.title: Run's House: Rev's Ol' Wild West
programme.desc: With their Spring Break on the horizon, Diggy and Russy try to convince Rev and Justine to take them on a trip. Rev decides that the family should take the vacation package that he won in a Rush Philanthropic charity auction.

programme.title: Run's House: Age Against The Machine
programme.desc: With their first book written together, "Take Back Your Family," now complete, Rev and Jus begin the process of recording the book on tape version.

programme.title: Run's House: Operation Album Drop
programme.desc: Team Blackout's media blitz continues as they hold a radio interview in support of their first live performance. But when the band finds out they're being assigned a choreographer for the gig they are resistant.

programme.title: Girlfriends: Good Grief
programme.desc: When Maya accuses Darnell of blaming her for the miscarriage, Joan and Lynn are worried that Maya is in denial and not allowing herself to grieve.

programme.title: Girlfriends: Spree to Free
programme.desc: Joan is convinced that Maya is not coping with the recent loss of her baby, and decides a little retail therapy will help her recover.

programme.title: Girlfriends: Snap Back
programme.desc: At a gathering to celebrate William and Monica's pregnancy, Maya makes a joke that the baby is hers. Worried that Maya is having trouble dealing with the loss of their baby, Darnell confronts Maya and learns that she has been taking pills to help her cope

programme.title: Girlfriends: Save the Last Dance
programme.desc: Lynn calls Joan, Maya, and William old after realizing they never go out anymore. They decide to prove Lynn wrong by joining her for a night on the town at a hot new club.

programme.title: Paranormal State: Haunted Connection
programme.desc: P.R.S. is called in to help a young mother tormented by an otherworldly connection to a teenage girl murdered in her neighborhood years ago. Could she have psychic ability or is there a more sinister force at work?

programme.title: Paranormal State: Requiem
programme.desc: A young woman named Kristy has been haunted in her own bedroom since she can remember. Now it's up to Ryan and the crew to help Kristy before she's overwhelmed by the entity.

programme.title: Paranormal State: Shape Shifter
programme.desc: PRS travels to Shapleigh, Maine where a woman and her daughter are reporting attacks from a winged creature with sharp teeth. Psychic Chip Coffey arrives and senses a half-human, half animal presence.

programme.title: Paranormal State: They Only Come Out at Night
programme.desc: Once night falls in a quaint?New England Town, a police officer's family is terrorized by demons.?PRS arrives just in time with the family ready to vacate their family home, rather than suffer the advances of these spirit creatures.

programme.title: Paranormal State: Mothman
programme.desc: Ryan takes his team to Point Pleasant, West Virginia to investigate his own personal holy grail of paranormal lore: the mysterious Mothman.

programme.title: Paranormal State: First Contact

programme.title: Paranormal State: Night Terrors
programme.desc: Ryan leads his team to one of the most haunted places in the US to confront their fears and solve a paranormal mystery. Aside from the alleged spirits of dead prisoners, something even darker may be lurking inside West Virginia State Penitentiary.

programme.title: Paranormal State: Supernatural Seduction

programme.title: Paranormal State: School House Haunting
programme.desc: PRS travels to Massachusetts to investigate an old schoolhouse where children's voices disturb a couple who've made it their home.

programme.title: Paranormal State: Invitation to Evil

programme.title: NEW & EXCLUSIVE! MOST HAUNTED

programme.title: NEW & EXCLUSIVE! MOST HAUNTED
programme.desc: Yvette and her team continue their investigation into this mysterious place. With something seemingly stalking the crew the night ends with a particularly vigorous spirit in a very small room.

programme.desc: Mark switches places with an attractive movie star who has a low opinion of men.

programme.title: Highway to Heaven: Keep Smiling
programme.desc: Jonathan must help his own widow regain her love for life.

programme.title: Highway to Heaven: The Last Assignment

programme.title: World's Greatest: Bridges
programme.desc: A bridge is a structure thats designed to transcend, but a great bridge can define the place where it stands. Symbols of human ingenuity, beauty, and grandeur, bridges connect us not only to each other but also to the past.

programme.title: World's Greatest: Wetland Animals
programme.desc: Wetland Animals dives into the swamps, rivers, and flood plains of the Everglades, Botswanas Okavango Delta, Kakadu National Park in Australia, and the Amazon to see deadly crocodiles, piranhas, hippopotamus, flamingo, manatee, and platypus.

programme.title: World's Greatest: Global Cities
programme.desc: Travel to the centers of wealth, power, industry, and innovation. From London to Tokyo, Hong Kong to New York, these are the cities that never sleep. The influence held in these economic hubs unites the global community.

programme.title: World's Greatest: Island Nations
programme.desc: Though many are small in stature, they have punched well above their weight on the global stage. Some are rooted in ancient history, while others are only just beginning to realize their full potential.

programme.title: World's Greatest: Iconic Buildings
programme.desc: In construction, only a few buildings can be groundbreaking. Vastly different in shape, size, and function, these diverse buildings prove there is no recipe for greatness, just the fundamental ingredients of vision, bravery, and imagination.

programme.title: Arthur: Arthur's Snow Biz/Bugged
programme.desc: Winter hits Elwood City and Arthur sees dollar signs! His snow-shoveling business is booming--that is, until Buster decides to get in on the action. And, Brain can be a know-it-all, and sometimes he really bugs people.

programme.title: Arthur: Sleep No More/Pet Peeved
programme.desc: Buster is convinced that Pizza Paula's all-you-can-eat contest is his destiny. But how can he possibly win such an important contest without any sleep? Binky volunteers to look after Francine's cat, Nemo, for the weekend.

programme.title: Arthur: The Chips Are Down/Revenge Of The Chip
programme.desc: What a mysterious, beautiful thing a green potato chip is--and D.W. just ate a gigantic one! But then she hears a rumor that they're poisonous...Sure, kids do some pretty embarrassing things, but do Moms have to tell everyone?

programme.title: Arthur: D.W., The Picky Eater/Buster And The Daredevils
programme.desc: It's wrong to call D.W. a picky eater. The only things she won't eat are vegetables, fish, fruit, and meat. Then, Arthur and Buster meet two really cool kids and, naturally, are utterly dazzled. How far will Buster go to be cool?

programme.title: Arthur: Big Horns George/Bleep
programme.desc: George is inspired to write and perform his own blues song when he's introduced to the music of Koko Taylor. And, D.W. overhears a mysterious word she doesnt know the meaning of. Can D.W. risk the consequences of blurting out <"BLEEP!">?

programme.title: Arthur: Binky Barnes, Art Expert/Arthur's Lucky Pencil
programme.desc: It's a nightmare--Arthur and Buster have to work with Binky. On an art project! I mean, what does a bully like Binky know about art? Then, Arthur discovers the secret to success--a pencil that brings good luck to whoever possesses it.

programme.title: Arthur: D.W. Tale Spins/Prunella Gets It Twice
programme.desc: What happens when you combine Greek Mythology with D.W.'s imagination? Then, getting two Polly Locket dolls almost ruins Prunella's birthday party. That, and Francine's bad mood--why, she wouldn't even sing the Happy Birthday song!

programme.title: Arthur: When Duty Calls Parts 1 & 2
programme.desc: Ladonna finds out the Army is transferring her dad to Oregon, and the whole Compson family is moving again. Fern and the others can tell Ladonna is upset, but dont know how to help. What can they do to make the transition easier?

programme.title: Arthur: D.W.'s Deer Friend/Buster Hits the Books
programme.desc: Its time to celebrate summer! Join Arthur as he takes a family vacation and visits Grandpa Daves farm. Then, Arthur, D.W. and Buster spend a few days at the beach where they discover the simple joys of building sandcastles!

programme.title: RAF: The Royal Air Force: Battle for the Skies
programme.desc: The RAFs maritime role is often overlooked. Between the wars the RAF operated elegant flying boats to patrol the far flung corners of the Empire.

programme.title: RAF: The Royal Air Force: Battle for the Skies
programme.desc: After the war, RAF transports helped keep Berliners alive during the Soviet blockade of the city in 1948/49. As well as flying round-the-clock operations into the airport, Sunderland flying boats delivered supplies by landing on Lake Havel near the city.

programme.title: RAF: The Royal Air Force: Battle for the Skies
programme.desc: In this programme we bring the RAF story into the modern era. Another aircraft to have extended the RAFs capabilities is the C130 Hercules. This aircraft has proved its capabilities in countless environments from resupply, to dropping paratroopers.

programme.title: The Blitz
programme.desc: The Blitz looks at the build-up to the raids and detailed footage of the destruction that followed. It features interviews from those who lived through it and stories of sadness and bravery, at a time when Britain held strong and swore not to surrender.

programme.title: NEW: The Siege of Malta
programme.desc: At last here is the definitive story of heroism and hardship of a people uniquely and collectively awarded the George Cross 'for gallantry', and told by some of the heroic survivors.

programme.title: Catfish: The TV Show
programme.desc: Kailani has fallen for Sam, her gay friend's online ex-boyfriend. Sam claims to love Kailani, but has been acting strange since she has tried to meet up with him. Nev and Max investigate. (S6, ep9)

programme.title: Catfish: The TV Show
programme.desc: Southern sweetheart Kelsie is madly in love with her online Romeo, Brandon. But after years of endless excuses about meeting up, Kelsie recruits Nev and Max to find who Brandon really is. (S6, ep14)

programme.title: Catfish: The TV Show: Keyonnah & Bow Wow
programme.desc: Superfan Keyonnah can hardly believe her luck, she's almost certain that she's been having an online relationship with her childhood crush, the rapper Bow Wow. Is this too good to be true?

programme.title: Catfish: The TV Show: Kim & Matt
programme.desc: Kim's been pouring her heart out to Matt for over 10 years. Now, Kim's facing a life-changing decision - should she marry her current boyfriend or find out if Matt is her soul mate?

programme.title: Catfish: The TV Show: Kya & Alyx
programme.desc: In this episode we meet Kya and Alyx, who fell in love quickly after meeting online. Are they being honest with each other? Hosts Nev Schulman and Max Joseph investigate.

programme.title: Catfish: The TV Show
programme.desc: After being Catfished by her best friend, Larissa turned to online pal Anthony for support. Feelings between them grew, but after some suspicious moves, Larissa is worried he is also lying. (S5, ep14)

programme.title: The City: The L Word
programme.desc: Whitney gets mixed signals from Jay and decides to ask him directly where she stands. Erin's new boyfriend comes to visit and Whitney realizes it's time to find her own apartment. (S1, ep3)

programme.title: The City: Good Things Come In Threes
programme.desc: Whitney dates a new guy and Jay confesses to Adam his true feelings about Whitney. (S1, ep4)

programme.title: The City: Boys Night Out
programme.desc: Adam lets loose while his girlfriend Allie is out of town, but when she hears he kissed another girl from Whitney and the others, Adam finds himself in hot water. (S1, ep5)

programme.title: The City: He Never Said He Had a Girlfriend
programme.desc: Allie breaks down after a run in with the girl who claims she kissed Adam, but Adam sticks to his story to win Allie back, and Whitney gets upset with Jay for taking Adam's side. (S1, ep6)

programme.title: The City: The Truth Hurts
programme.desc: Kelly Cutrone accuses Allie of being too skinny, and Whitney finds herself caught in the middle. Erin runs into an ex-boyfriend and old feelings begin to return. (S1, ep7)

programme.title: The City: Mingling with the Commoners
programme.desc: Olivia invites Jay's band to perform at one of her charity events but her plan backfires when the band is disrespected on-stage, leaving Whitney and Olivia at odds. (s1, ep8)

programme.title: The City: Unexpected Roommates
programme.desc: Adam kicks Jay out of his apartment so Allie can move in &amp; Jay asks Whitney if he can live with her. Erin's plan to juggle two guys backfires &amp; leaves her alone on New Year's Eve. (S1, ep9)

programme.title: The Hills: Somebody Always Has to Cry
programme.desc: It's the gang's first holiday in LA but not everyone gets what they wish for. A New Year's kiss is hard to come by for Lauren when Jason learns she got a call from an old flame. (S1, ep7)

programme.title: The Hills: You Can't Just Be With Me?
programme.desc: Jason wants to make Lauren's 20th birthday special, but when she lies to him about working with male models for a Teen Vogue assignment, their relationship is put to the test. (S1, ep8)

programme.title: The Hills: Love is Not a Maybe Thing
programme.desc: Heidi decides she's had enough drama with Jordan. When she turns to the girls for advice, she realises what she has to do. And are Lauren and Jason's fighting days finally behind them? (S1, ep9)

programme.title: The Hills: Timing is Everything
programme.desc: Lauren's work at LA Fashion Week brings a career opportunity of a lifetime, but she's torn between her job and Jason. Whitney leaves LA; Heidi and Audrina are single in the city. (S1, ep10)

programme.title: 48 Hours: Reasonable Doubt
programme.desc: In September 1999, Brian Eftenoff of Phoenix, Az. Was convicted of murdering his wife, Judi. It was alleged that Eftenoff forced more than a gram of cocaine down his wifes throat causing her to die of a cocaine-induced stroke.

programme.title: 48 Hours: A Daughter, A Mortgage, and Two Murders
programme.desc: A report on the investigation into the murders of Greg and Bernadette Ohlemacher in 2005. The Albuquerque, New Mexico couple had been shot dead in their home

programme.title: 48 Hours: Murder in the Fast Lane
programme.desc: A report on the March 1988 murder of legendary racecar driver Mickey Thompson and his wife Trudy. Thompsons sister is convinced that Michael Goodwin, her brothers former partner, was the killer.

programme.title: 48 Hours: Their Father, The Godfather
programme.desc: In an exclusive interview, and for the first time, three of the children of the late crime boss John Gotti discuss the life they experienced growing up as members of his family, how they were sheltered from an awareness of Gottis lifestyle.

programme.title: 48 Hours: Deadly Secret
programme.desc: A behind-the-scenes look at the Kalamazoo, Michigan's cold case unit's investigation of the September 1994 disappearance of Khristine Smith, a seemingly happy wife and mother.

programme.title: 48 Hours: Dirty Little Secrets
programme.desc: In April 2006, Matt Baker, a pastor from Waco, Texas, returned home to find his wife Kari unconscious, with an empty bottle of Unisom and a suicide note beside her. Police ruled it a suicide. However, her family believed otherwise.

programme.title: Mission: Impossible: A Cube Of Sugar
programme.desc: The IMF team must rescue a U.S. intelligence operative who has top-secret military plans on a microcircuit chip.

programme.title: Mission: Impossible: The Traitor
programme.desc: An American intelligence officer, Hughes, has defected to the enemy with the only copy of an encoded top-secret message.

programme.title: Mission: Impossible: The Psychic
programme.desc: The team must trick a crooked investment promoter into endorsing $80 million in stolen stocks and then getting them back from him.

programme.title: Mission: Impossible: The Survivors
programme.desc: A grave threat to national security is posed when an enemy agent (Albert Paulsen) kidnaps two of the three key scientists who collectively know the formula for the cobalt bomb.

programme.title: Mission: Impossible: Trek
programme.desc: The Impossible Missions Force matches wits with a hijacker and a disloyal prison commandant.

programme.title: Barney and Friends: Play Piano With Me!
programme.desc: The children learn all about the piano when they play games, listen to real pianos and even play a little themselves.

programme.title: Barney and Friends: A World of Friends
programme.desc: The children learn about many different countries while experiencing an "International Fair" on the playground.

programme.title: Barney and Friends: Easy as ABC
programme.desc: When Baby Bop uses the caboose mailbox to deliver a special invitation to her tea party, she discovers that no one can read her handwriting. Barney and his friends find creative ways to help her learn her ABCs!

programme.title: Barney and Friends: Tea-riffic Manners
programme.desc: A tea party planned by the children turns into a fun opportunity to reinforce lessons about good manners! Throughout the day, Baby Bop is given helpful advice.

programme.title: Barney and Friends: Barney and Friends
programme.desc: Graces food drive isnt going very well until Melanie offers to help. Melanie comes up with the perfect idea to get people to donate put on a movie premiere in the caboose!

programme.title: Barney and Friends: Barney and Friends
programme.desc: Baby Bop meets a new girl named Jill who doesnt want to join the fun.

programme.title: Barney and Friends: Barney and Friends
programme.desc: Its Barneys birthday, and there are surprises around every corner. Baby Bop is practicing her marching because she will be joining a real marching rhythm band and is having trouble keeping a beat.

programme.title: Barney and Friends: A-Counting We Will Go!
programme.desc: Barney and the kids help Baby Bop count to ten by playing games, and visiting a Make-Believe Market.

programme.title: Auction Hunters: The Chicago Grand Slam
programme.desc: 1984 Yamaha SS440 Snowmobile that introduced the revolutionary shock absorber suspension; rare autographed 1920s baseball glove; mint Hank Aaron signed baseball; authentic 1950s Robby the Robot collector toy.

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Betsy's Last Stand
programme.desc: With their beloved bread truck on life support, Ton and Allen head to an auction to help save her. Will an industrial grinder and a classic Chevy be enough to mend Betsy, or will the guys be forced to say goodbye for good?

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Win Lose or Joust
programme.desc: Ton and Allen race back from an auction to purchase a rare comic valued at over $100,000. The guys uncover a Samurai sword used for ritual suicide and Allen lives out his childhood fantasy of becoming knight.

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Allen's Ruff Day
programme.desc: Ton and Allen head to an auction in Ton's hometown and end up battling with a big-mouthed buyer. They discover a pair of tranquilizer dart guns and also end up fighting with a K9!

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Money Makin' Monster Machines
programme.desc: The Auction Hunters team goes on the attack & ends up on a collision course with a hardened veteran auction buyer. They uncover a collection of speedy off-road vehicles and some hardcore heavy metal from the turn-of the-century!

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Whiskey Business
programme.desc: An auction in Allen's old stomping grounds triggers memories of being a "lone wolf." The guys find a set of RC race boats and when they buy a man-cave unit full of old whiskey, a night of partying leads to some tough sales.

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Fake Punt Payoff
programme.desc: Ton and Allen contend with a large crowd of inexperienced auction-buyers at a huge storage container auction in Pasadena. They find a small fleet of Segway personal transporters and an enormous custom-made shotgun.

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Separation Anxiety
programme.desc: With Ton missing, Allen struggles to keep the pawn shop afloat while training Elle to work an auction. After a fierce bidding war with Caroline, pieces from a century old motorcycle may not be enough to save the day. ed.

programme.title: Auction Hunters: You Foos You Lose
programme.desc: When their truck breaks down, Ton and Allen lay it all on the line to raise money to fix her. They score a Foosball table, Tommy Gun drums and to Ton's delight, a treasure trove of Twinkies, but will it be enough?

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Knuckle Dust
programme.desc: 1870s French Jarre Dolne Knuckle Duster revolver-knife-brass knuckle combo, a rare original George Rodrigue "Blue Dog" screenprint and a 1980 autographed Raging Bull movie poster.

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Mr. Haff Goes to Washington
programme.desc: Ton and Allen invade the Nation's capital, but meet strong resistance from local bidders. The guys uncover a Civil War era black powder revolver and a stash of South African gold coins!

programme.title: Teen Mom: To Be With You
programme.desc: Amber and Gary move in together; Tyler's family questions his decision; Maci considers letting her boyfriend move in; Farrah struggles with the separation.

programme.title: Teen Mom: The Last Straw
programme.desc: Amber learns she is being investigated; Ryan wants to meet Maci's new boyfriend; Sophia's grandmother is suing for visitation rights; Tyler's father gets out of jail.

programme.title: Teen Mom: Trials and Tribulations
programme.desc: Catelynn wants to mend her relationship with her mother; Amber and Gary meet with CPS; Maci decides to move home; Farrah goes to court.

programme.title: Teen Mom: Trick or Treat
programme.desc: Maci and Ryan argue over Bentley on his birthday. Amber has a break down. Farrah struggles to balance Sophia with finishing school credits, and Catelynn and Tyler look for jobs.

programme.title: Teen Mom: Terrible Twos
programme.desc: Gary refuses to celebrate Leah's birthday with Amber, Catelynn goes on a retreat to address fears about the adoption, Farrah gets a puppy, and Ryan discovers that Kyle is living with Maci.

programme.title: Teen Mom: Without You
programme.desc: Farrah and Sophia visit Sophia's father's grave; Amber and her mother argue; Maci struggles to keep up; Catelynn and Tyler want to invite their daughter to graduation. (S3, ep7)

programme.title: CSI: NY: Smooth Criminal
programme.desc: A suave and charming hitman lead the team to uncover a conspiracy.

programme.title: CSI: NY: The Untouchable
programme.desc: The team investigate the death of a conspiracy-obsessed woman.

programme.title: CSI: NY: Do Or Die
programme.desc: The team find themselves immersed in the competitive world of overprivileged youth.

programme.title: CSI: NY: Identity Crisis
programme.desc: The shooting of an old man looks like an open-and-shut case.

programme.title: CSI: NY: Food For Thought
programme.desc: The team investigate the explosion of a gourmet food truck.

programme.title: CSI: NY
programme.desc: The team suspect that a woman's death might be the work of a serial killer.

programme.title: CSI: Miami: Kill Clause
programme.desc: The CSIs suspect a company is killing its employees in order to profit.

programme.title: CSI: Miami
programme.desc: A body falls from the sky and the team discover it is from a commercial space flight.

programme.title: CSI: Miami: Backfire
programme.desc: The team tries to determine the cause of a house fire.

programme.title: CSI: Miami: Meltdown
programme.desc: Delko returns to the fold to assist the CSIs.

programme.title: CSI: Miami: Time Bomb
programme.desc: The state's attorney Delko has been working with, is killed by a car bomb.

programme.title: CSI: Miami: All Fall Down
programme.desc: A serial killer is on the loose, leaving his mark on the chests of his victims.

programme.title: Homicide Hunter: A Beautiful Shade of Death
programme.desc: When police discover the lifeless bodies of Sophia Gerardo, four children and a house cat, they suspect ritualistic mass murder. But Lt. Joe Kenda uncovers a reality far more frightening.

programme.title: Homicide Hunter: Justified
programme.desc: A young man is found gunned down, leading Lt. Joe Kenda to delve into his troubled past and his connection to the world of rare coins.

programme.title: Homicide Hunter: Eyes of a Child
programme.desc: A loving, churchgoing grandmother is found stabbed to death in her apartment, leaving Joe Kenda to wonder what sort of monster could do such a thing.

programme.title: Homicide Hunter: Death Grip
programme.desc: When a speeding truck crashes into a residential building, officers find the lifeless body of Michael Faast behind the wheel. But he didnt die in the wreck he was shot point-blank in the temple.

programme.title: Homicide Hunter: Stuck In A Coffin
programme.desc: In the aftermath of a five-alarm fire, first responders discover a lifeless body. When Kenda learns that the deadly blaze was no accident, he launches a manhunt.

programme.title: Homicide Hunter: Run for your Life
programme.desc: A slain body of a marathon runner is found just hours before a big race. With the help of a trusted K-9 officer, Kenda sets off to find the killer himself before he strikes again.

programme.title: The Exes
programme.desc: Eden shares a secret about herself and Phil with Holly, who blabs to Stuart and Haskell, testing boundaries within the group.

programme.title: The Exes
programme.desc: Stuart's sister Nicki (Leah Remini) shows up with some shocking news about her marriage. Phil and Eden consider bringing a guest into the bedroom.

programme.title: The Exes
programme.desc: Phil and Eden's relationship is strained when he is named one of the top ten bachelors in New York City and has to pretend to be single. Stuart dates the twin sister of his evil ex, Sabrina.

programme.title: The Exes
programme.desc: Nicki (Leah Remini) returns to start her new life in the city, disrupting Stuart's professional life and Phil's personal life. Haskell and Eden attend an all-nude production of "Twelve Angry Men."

programme.title: Wardens: Best of: Michigan Whitetail Patrol
programme.desc: Michigan's archery deer season lasts 77 days and the regular firearm season is 16 days long. Over that time period, C.O.'s use a variety of tactics to make sure everyone is playing by the rules.

programme.title: Wardens: Pure Michigan
programme.desc: The state of Michigan is highlighted through a contest to win hunting licenses and over $4000 in prizes. Officers also patrol during a summer boating festival and the firearm deer season.

programme.title: Wardens: Detroit River Walleye
programme.desc: Conservation Officers patrol fishermen and women on the Detroit River, on the border between Michigan and Canada during the spring spawning run for walleye.

programme.title: Wardens: Autumn East to West
programme.desc: An officer on Michigan's east side meets a driver on the road without a license and an officer on the state's west side patrols during a waterfowl hunt on a state game area.

programme.title: Wardens: Man-Made Fires
programme.desc: Conservation Officers on patrols during fall fishing season as well as spring turkey season encounter suspects that have set fires in conditions where they shouldn't have.

programme.title: Wardens: Whitetail Patrol Tactics
programme.desc: Michigan Conservation Officers employ numerous tactics to enforce the state laws. Some of them include using aerial patrols to look out for illegal activitity as well as keeping an eye out for blinds on state land that have been in place too long.

programme.title: Rookie Blue: Brotherhood
programme.desc: Dov and Gail work together under Swareks expert tutelage in a stake-out operation to stop an Asian gang from killing a snitch.

programme.title: Rookie Blue: Best Laid Plans
programme.desc: 15 Divisions hunt for an armed robber leads them to the scene of a horrible car accident. While Andy deals with a woman pinned in her car, the other officers must track and apprehend the fugitive

programme.title: Rookie Blue: A Little Faith
programme.desc: When Traci and Andy are sent out on an undercover training exercise, they stumble upon a young woman who is about to die of an overdose. Meanwhile, Dov finds himself on a ride-along with a drug dealer and old friend of his deceased brother

programme.title: Rookie Blue: On The Double
programme.desc: When Gail Pecks uniform is stolen, the rookies go after a vigilante who is impersonating a police officer. Meanwhile, Swareks off the grid, trying to get information out of former crime enforcer Jamie Brennan

programme.title: Rookie Blue: Gods Good Grace
programme.desc: While Swarek is brutally interrogated by Jamie Brennan in the basement of a Pickering farmhouse, the rookies help Andy solve a mystery that may reveal Swareks location

programme.title: Rookie Blue: The First Day of the Rest of Your Life
programme.desc: When a mysterious young girl vanishes from the scene of a multi-car accident, Andy McNally connects the girl to a 7-year-old cold case.

programme.title: Deepwater Horizon
programme.desc: A dramatization of the disaster in April 2010, when the offshore drilling rig called the Deepwater Horizon exploded, resulting in the worst oil spill in American history.

programme.title: I Am Soldier
programme.desc: A military chef (Tom Hughes) undergoes rigorous physical and psychological testing to join the elite branch known as the Special Air Service.

programme.title: USS Indianapolis: Men of Courage

programme.title: Relic Hunter: Emperor's Bride

programme.title: Relic Hunter: Diamond in the Rough
programme.desc: Sydney, Nigel and rival relic hunter Kurt Reiner attempt to find the lost baseball glove of Jimmy Jonesboro.

programme.title: Relic Hunter: Nine Lives
programme.desc: Everyone who steals a statue that represents the Egyptian cat-goddess Mafdet is killed. Now, the statue has disappeared and Sidney and Nigel are tasked with retrieving it.

programme.title: Relic Hunter: The Book of Love
programme.desc: Sydney and Nigel are in Milan, Italy to search for Casanova's lost Book of Love.

programme.title: Relic Hunter: Myth of the Maze
programme.desc: Sydney, Nigel and Claudia visit Athens, Greece to search the Minotaur's maze for the legendary golden twine.

programme.title: Relic Hunter: Afterlife and Death
programme.desc: Sydney and Nigel are in Cairo, Egypt and then Amsterdam. They must beat rival relic hunter Avery Ko to the Pharaoh Thutmose's diamond before it is cut up and sold.

programme.title: Ancient Aliens and the New World Order 2

programme.title: Ancient Alien Question

programme.title: The UFO Battle of Los Angeles

programme.title: Grizzy and The Lemmings

programme.title: Grizzy and The Lemmings

programme.title: Grizzy and The Lemmings

programme.title: Grizzy and The Lemmings

programme.title: Grizzy and The Lemmings

programme.title: Grizzy and The Lemmings

programme.title: Grizzy and The Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy is persuaded that the she-bear he's in love with has been turned into a frog. Whilst he looks through books of fairy tales, searching for a means to return his beloved to her original form, the Lemmings try to recover the frog.

programme.title: Grizzy and The Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy discovers a baby raccoon not far from the log cabin. When he sees its big moist eyes, Grizzy melts and adopts the creature. When the Lemmings drag the baby into their dangerous games, the overprotective Grizzy steps in.

programme.title: Grizzy and The Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy discovers the pleasures of video games on the ranger's console. The Lemmings want to try their hand at the joystick but Grizzy refuses to interrupt his kart racing game.

programme.title: Grizzy and The Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy builds a look-alike robot to keep the Lemmings away while he prepares a party for his beloved she-bear. But his double's artificial intelligence leaves a lot to be desired.

programme.title: Grizzy and The Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy's she-bear is convinced she's a lemming after hitting her head. Grizzy believes another well-aimed hit will correct her thinking, but the Lemmings are thrilled to have a new playmate.

programme.title: Grizzy and The Lemmings
programme.desc: When a meteorite falls not far from the log cabin, strange berries start to grow. One of their properties is that they make anyone who eats them grow to disproportionate sizes.

programme.title: Grizzy and The Lemmings
programme.desc: Under the wood floor of the log cabin, Grizzy and the Lemmings discover the entrance to an underground gallery with an old treasure card that indicates the location of a treasure.

programme.title: Grizzy and The Lemmings
programme.desc: When he brandishes an Indian sceptre that the Lemmings brought home with other antique objects, Grizzy sees the Lemmings bow low before him and behave like servants.

programme.title: Grizzy and The Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy tries to impress the she-bear that he's in love with by making a sculpture of her from a piece of wood. But as soon as the artist's back is turned, the Lemmings gnaw at the work of art in order to transform it into a toboggan slide.

programme.title: Grizzy and The Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings throw a surprise birthday party for one of the clan. When Happy Birthday rings out, the surprise is as great for Grizzy, who is trying to take a nap after a hearty meal, as it is for the birthday Lemming hero in question.

programme.title: Grizzy and The Lemmings
programme.desc: A gust of wind sweeps away the flower that Grizzy's adored she-bear wears in her hair. Grizzy sees this as a golden opportunity to dazzle her by bringing it back.

programme.title: Grizzy and The Lemmings

programme.title: Grizzy and The Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy finds a vintage stopwatch in the garage which lets one wind back the minute that has just passed by, and it can even stop time and movement in one's surroundings.

programme.title: Grizzy and The Lemmings

programme.title: Grizzy and The Lemmings

programme.title: Grizzy and The Lemmings

programme.title: Grizzy and The Lemmings

programme.title: Gus the Itsy Bitsy Knight

programme.title: Gus the Itsy Bitsy Knight

programme.title: Gus the Itsy Bitsy Knight

programme.title: Gus the Itsy Bitsy Knight

programme.title: Gus the Itsy Bitsy Knight

programme.title: Gus the Itsy Bitsy Knight
programme.desc: While on a fishing trip, Gus pulls a mysterious chest out of the water. Unable to resist opening it, he accidentally frees a bewitched spear from inside it.

programme.title: Gus the Itsy Bitsy Knight
programme.desc: Gus finds a little rock embellished with magic symbols, which is in fact a lucky charm. Gus wonders what he should do with it: surely, using it to his advantage would be unworthy of a knight.

programme.title: Gus the Itsy Bitsy Knight
programme.desc: Rosie auditions to accompany Arthur at the Queen's Festival, but she sings horribly out of tune, unbeknownst to Arthur. Caught between a rock and a hard place, Gus is scared to tell Rosie the truth.

programme.title: Gus the Itsy Bitsy Knight
programme.desc: When Grandpa Merlin has gone missing, a famous detective is called in by Mommy Queen, but he concludes that all is normal. Not convinced, Gus, Iris and Diane decide to lead their own investigation.

programme.title: Gus the Itsy Bitsy Knight
programme.desc: When a dangerous dragon is at large, Mommy Queen calls upon Victor the Hardy One, a great and legendary knight whom Gus idolises, to take care of it. Gus joins Victor on his quest.

programme.title: Gus the Itsy Bitsy Knight

programme.title: Gus the Itsy Bitsy Knight

programme.title: Gus the Itsy Bitsy Knight

programme.title: Gus the Itsy Bitsy Knight

programme.title: Gus the Itsy Bitsy Knight

programme.title: Gus the Itsy Bitsy Knight

programme.title: Gus the Itsy Bitsy Knight

programme.title: Bob the Builder

programme.title: Bob the Builder
programme.desc: Bob is rendering a wall for Mr Sabatini. The job is straightforward, but the finished result looks rather plain, so Bob offers to get some tiles from JJs yard to decorate it. While Bob is gone, Mr Sabatini demonstrates his soccer skills to Dizzy.

programme.title: Bob the Builder
programme.desc: Bob is erecting a tent to accommodate some newcomers to the valley. Mr Bentley is organising everything, but unfortunately leaves his phone with Spud who promptly declares himself Mr Bentleys Assistant.

programme.title: Bob the Builder
programme.desc: Mr. Beasley decides to grow pineapples, and the best way top do this is to build a pineapple pit a special pit, heated by horse manure! Travis wants to help and decides to fetch some horse manure from Farmer Pickles farm in Bobsville as quick as he can.

programme.title: Bob the Builder
programme.desc: Bob and the gang are building the road connecting Bobs mobile home site with the location of the new yard. Its a big job for Roley, but just as Bobs explaining the job, a pretty little bird flies overhead clutching some twigs in her beak.

programme.title: Bob the Builder
programme.desc: Mr Bentley is organising a winter fair in the town hall square and enlists Bob to help set up the stalls, lights and the centrepiece of the fair a giant inflatable Santa Claus.

programme.title: Bob the Builder
programme.desc: Farmer Pickles has decided to open a camp site on his land, and Bob is installing a shower block and fence to keep the sheep out. For once, he is working on his own while Wendy goes on holiday with Jenny.

programme.title: Bob the Builder
programme.desc: Train enthusiast Mr Bentley is away for the day and, in his absence, Mrs Bentley decides to surprise her husband by asking Bob to build him a brand new model railway in the shed.

programme.title: Bob the Builder
programme.desc: The team are all ready to set up Mr Sabatinis bakery opposite the windmill so its close to the flour. Bob promises a surprise when they get there, and who should roll out from behind a bush but Benny!

programme.title: Bob the Builder

programme.title: Bob the Builder
programme.desc: The whole town is practicing for an egg and spoon race, which Mrs Percival has organised. Trix decides to enter, but unfortunately she practices with fresh eggs and in her usual haste she manages to make a great mess in JJs yard.

programme.title: Bob the Builder
programme.desc: Its Mr and Mrs Bentleys twenty fifth wedding anniversary and to celebrate Mr Bentley asks Bob and the gang to build a special summer house. Mrs Bentley is out for the day and the summer house is to be a surprise.

programme.desc: The harrowing story of EastEnders actress Gemma McCluskie, who was murdered by her older brother in the flat they shared in east London in 2012.

programme.title: Girlfriends: It's Been Determined

programme.desc: When Joan buys an expensive new kitchen range for their new house, her fiance Aaron gets upset that she spent money without discussing it with him.

programme.title: Earth: Final Conflict: One Taelon Avenue

programme.title: The Lost World: Trophies

programme.title: The Lost World: Voodoo Queen

programme.title: Catfish UK: Levi & Will
programme.desc: Levi is convinced Will is his dream man and broke up with his boyfriend so they could be together. After always cancelling on Levi, Oobah and Nella suspect something fishy is going on. (S2, ep2)

programme.title: Catfish UK: Luke & Amy
programme.desc: Drummer Luke first started talking to nurse Amy when she came to one of his gigs 6 months ago. They had an instant spark but unfortunately every time they try and meet she cancels. (S2, ep9)

programme.title: Catfish UK: Emma & Harlin
programme.desc: Julie and Oobah uncover more than they were expecting, as their search to help Emma find her online love Harlin takes a sinister turn. (S1, ep1)

programme.title: Catfish UK: Angelica & Jeroen

programme.title: Catfish UK: Neil & Jasmin

programme.title: 48 Hours: Endgame
programme.desc: Janet Levine March, a wife and mother of two young children, disappeared on August 15, 1996. In December 2004, a grand jury indicted her husband, Perry, for her murder, based on circumstantial evidence.

programme.title: 48 Hours: Fatal Attraction
programme.desc: Thomas Capano, a successful Delaware lawyer lived a double life, a devoted family man while having affairs. When Anne Marie Fahey, one of these women, mysteriously disappeared police were at first stumped. Finally evidence led to Capano.

programme.title: 48 Hours
programme.desc: A report on the investigation into the 1960 murder of Irena Garza, in McAllen, Texas, and the efforts that family members and police have taken to bring the suspect, a Roman Catholic priest, to trial for the crime.

programme.title: 48 Hours
programme.desc: Elizabeth Welsh's husband, Patrick, left her and their two sons what appeared to be a suicide note and disappeared. After investigating the situation, Elizabeth discovered that Patrick is still alive, living in Texas.

programme.title: 48 Hours: To Hell and Back
programme.desc: An interview with 17-year-old Jacque Marris who reveals new details about her abduction and how she and Tamara Brooks, another teenage victim, survived a harrowing 12-hour kidnapping on Aug. 1, 2002.

programme.title: 48 Hours: The Long Island Serial Killer
programme.desc: A report on the disappearance of Shannan Gilbert, near Gilgo Beach, New York. The search for Shannan led to the discovery of a total of ten bodies in the scrub brush of Gilgo Beach, leading police to suspect the work of a serial killer.

programme.title: Monster Squad: No Face
programme.desc: Mayor Goldwyn gives the deed to the city to Chief Running Nose, and then he declares all crime legal. Before long, the Monster Squad discovers No Face has been masquerading as both of them.

programme.title: Monster Squad: The Astrologer
programme.desc: During a newscast, The Astrologer announces that an earthquake is about to devastate the land, and to ensure his prediction comes true, he makes plans to detonate an atomic bomb.

programme.title: Monster Squad: Ultra Witch
programme.desc: Ultra Witch dries up the world's milk supply, but she exposes herself by sending a henchman out for cookies.

programme.title: Monster Squad: The Wizard
programme.desc: The Wizard devises a scheme to steal all of the national monuments for his own personal exhibit. Meanwhile, Walter concocts an antidote that works on every poison known to man.

programme.title: Monster Squad: The Skull
programme.desc: The Skull decides to resurrect all of the world's villains, beginning with a mummy.

programme.title: Monster Squad: The Weatherman
programme.desc: The Weatherman causes a national blizzard in the middle of summer and demands that U.S. citizens unanimously elect him president.

programme.title: Monster Squad: Lawrence of Moravia
programme.desc: Frank and Bruce are captured by a sheik who's been stealing plumbing supplies just for the thrill of it.

programme.title: Monster Squad: Albert/Alberta
programme.desc: As dual-gendered Albert/Alberta begins melting glaciers in a plot to flood the world, he/she attempts to complete a collection of animals, which is missing a male werewolf and a male vampire.

programme.title: Monster Squad: Queen Bee
programme.desc: Dracula infiltrates the Queen Bee's hive in an effort to thwart a worldwide bee invasion.

programme.title: Monster Squad: Mr. Mephisto
programme.desc: Confusion abounds when Mr. Mephisto replaces Mayor Goldwyn with a lookalike doll who spouts off radical opinions.

programme.title: Farscape: Farscape: S3 E15 - Infinite Possibilities, Part 2: Icarus Abides
programme.desc: Jack (The Ancient) unlocks the wormhole knowledge in Crichton's mind so together they can build a device to destroy the Scarran dreadnought.

programme.title: Farscape: Farscape: S3 E16 - Revenging Angel
programme.desc: D'Argo injures Crichton, as Crichton lies in a coma/near death, he escapes into a highly animated world. It's Farscape, Chuck Jones/Loony Tunes style.

programme.title: Farscape: Farscape: S3 E17 - The Choice
programme.desc: Aeryn is devastated. She leaves Talyn, and grieves on a planet. Talyn's crew tries to help but she doesn't want their help.

programme.title: Farscape: Farscape: S3 E18 - Fractures
programme.desc: A group of escaped prisoners come aboard Moya followed shortly by Aeryn, Crais and Rygel who have finally returned from Talyn.

programme.title: Farscape: Farscape: S3 E19 - I - Yensch, You - Yensch
programme.desc: D'Argo and Rygel meet Braca and Scorpius in a cafe to conduct negotiations when it is unexpectedly attacked.

programme.title: Farscape: Farscape: S3 E20 - Into The Lion's Den, Part 1: Lambs To The Slaughter
programme.desc: The crew must stop Scorpius's research on wormhole technology. The only way to stop him is to board the command carrier.
